verbs.description: Republican voters [V: are] standing by the Trump administration 's policy of separating families at the border , a new poll shows , despite the intense backlash and controversy surrounding the practice .

[ARG1: Republican voters] are [V: standing] [ARG2: by the Trump administration 's policy of separating families at the border] , a new poll shows , [ARGM-ADV: despite the intense backlash and controversy surrounding the practice] .

Republican voters are standing by the Trump administration 's policy of [V: separating] [ARG1: families] [ARGM-LOC: at the border] , a new poll shows , despite the intense backlash and controversy surrounding the practice .

Republican voters are standing by the Trump administration 's policy of separating families at the border , a new poll shows , despite [ARG1: the intense backlash and controversy] [V: surrounding] [ARG2: the practice] .
